channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Poppy Unveils New Original Solo Song “Unravel”: Stream
item.description: 🎶 Listen up, Poppy fans! New solo track "Unravel" is here to rock your world! 🤘🔥 #Poppy #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Ari Lennox Announces New Album Vacancy: Hear “Under The Moon”
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to groove! Ari Lennox is dropping her new album Vacancy 🌙 Listen to "Under The Moon" now! #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Wilco and Billy Bragg to Perform Mermaid Avenue Live for First Time at Solid Sound Festival 2026
item.description: 🎶 Dive into 2026 with the ultimate collab as Wilco and Billy Bragg hit the stage for Mermaid Avenue live at Solid Sound Festival! 🧜‍♀️🎸 #SolidSound2026 #MusicLegends

item.title: Ms. Lauryn Hill Announces “Artist in Residence” Tour of Canada
item.description: 🎉 Canada, get ready for the iconic Ms. Lauryn Hill on her "Artist in Residence" tour! 🇨🇦🎤 #LaurynHill #ArtistInResidenceTour

item.title: Foo Fighters Announce 2026 Stadium Tour, Share New Song “Asking for a Friend”: Listen
item.description: 🎸 Ready to rock out with Foo Fighters on their 2026 Stadium Tour? Check out their new song “Asking for a Friend” now! 🤘🎶 #FooFighters #NewMusic
